sqlMap.select: select A.UNIT_ID as unitId, A.SUPER_UNITID as superUnitId, A.LEAF_FLAG as leafFlag, A.UNIT_NAME as unitName from SYS_UNIT A where A.SUPER_UNITID is null order by A.UNIT_ID
select A.UNIT_ID as unitId, A.SUPER_UNITID as superUnitId, A.LEAF_FLAG as leafFlag, A.UNIT_NAME as unitName from SYS_UNIT A where A.SUPER_UNITID = #superUnitId# order by A.UNIT_ID

select A.UNIT_ID as unitId, A.SUPER_UNITID as superUnitId, A.LEAF_FLAG as leafFlag, A.UNIT_NAME as unitName from SYS_UNIT A where 1=1
A.UNIT_ID = #unitId#
A.UNIT_NAME like '%$unitName$%'
order by A.UNIT_ID

select A.UNIT_ID as unitId, A.SUPER_UNITID as superUnitId, A.LEAF_FLAG as leafFlag, A.UNIT_NAME as unitName from SYS_UNIT A INNER JOIN SYS_UNITMAP UMAP ON UMAP.RELA_UNITID=A.UNIT_ID AND UMAP.UNIT_ID=#orgId# where 1=1
A.UNIT_ID = #unitId#
A.UNIT_NAME like '%$unitName$%'
order by A.UNIT_ID
